testimonials.name: angela c.
testimonials.title: Real royal jelly
testimonials.quote: I love bees and so I decided to rely on them to fight my low energy. I opened the bottle and immediately smelled its sweet scent and was happy about it. I've been taking it for a few days now and I have to say that the difference is noticeable. I'm less tired. The product is ok and I won't abandon it easily. Excellent shipping and small capsules easy to swallow.

testimonials.name: Gabriella Longega
testimonials.title: Excellent for keeping fit
testimonials.quote: Well packaged product. Capsules easy to swallow. I use it constantly to improve immune defenses.

testimonials.name: soul.food
testimonials.title: Recommended
testimonials.quote: Recommended. Before buying this product I took a much more expensive supplement with echinacea daily for about a year, for about 4 months I've chosen this cheaper one with only echinacea. In the past 6/7 years I caught every seasonal illness (and I don't have children who going to school can bring home flu and colds). This winter I spent it unscathed. Be patient! Being a natural product it needs time, and I mean several months.

testimonials.name: wolf
testimonials.title: Echinacea great quality
testimonials.quote: I've been buying them for years now and I take one every morning. Excellent product that preserves me a lot from seasonal illnesses. Very good quality price. Highly recommended. Sometimes I let myself be convinced by promo discounts but I always came back.

testimonials.name: RICCARDO HEUSCH
testimonials.title: Vitamin B6
testimonials.quote: Excellent quality price ratio. The tablets even if a bit large are easily swallowable. Being a supplement it takes time to evaluate its benefits.

testimonials.name: Feciale Massimo
testimonials.title: Vitamins
testimonials.quote: The product met my expectations, and arrived within the expected times.

testimonials.name: roberto gasparri
testimonials.title: Excellent product
testimonials.quote: Convenient in easily swallowable capsules and easy to give even to my children when they are a bit tired during the change of season. A month of treatment is enough and iron levels in the blood rise immediately. For me instead I use it regularly before and after my period to compensate for the lowering of iron levels and limit tiredness. I've been using it for a long time and I find it really effective.
